hero.title: Your Personal Skill Map
hero.subtitle: Build your career roadmap. Import skills from your resume or explore any career path. Visualize progress and generate tailored resumes.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Try "Software Engineer" or "I want to work remotely"

twoPaths.importDescription: Already have a resume or LinkedIn profile? Let AI extract your existing skills and build your map automatically.
twoPaths.exploreDescription: Discover what skills you need for any career. Search thousands of roles and see the complete skill map.

workflow.title: How It Works
workflow.step1Description: Upload any document - PDF, Word, images, or paste a LinkedIn URL. Our AI extracts skills, contact info, education, experience, projects, and professional summary.
workflow.step2Description: Watch your skills transform into an interactive map. Identify gaps, track progress, and discover connections.
workflow.step3Description: Create AI-tailored resumes for any job. Just paste a job posting URL and get a custom PDF in seconds.

import.title: Import from Anywhere
import.description: PDF resumes, Word docs, images, LinkedIn, GitHub, and more

skillMaps.title: AI-Generated Skill Maps
skillMaps.description: Visualize skills needed for any career path

resume.title: Smart Resume Generation
resume.description: AI-tailored PDFs that match job requirements

education.title: Education & Credentials
education.description: Keep degrees and certifications alongside work history

chat.title: AI Chat Assistant
chat.description: Modify your skill map with natural language

universe.title: Skill Universe Dashboard
universe.description: See all your skills across every career path

share.title: Share Your Progress
share.description: Public skill maps with unique URLs

demo.title: See Your Skills Come to Life
demo.description: Here's what a skill map looks like. Yours is waiting to be discovered.

secondaryCta.title: Explore Career Paths
secondaryCta.description: Search for any career and discover the skills you need to succeed. AI generates comprehensive skill maps for thousands of roles.
secondaryCta.searchPlaceholder: Try "Software Engineer" or "I want to work remotely"

home.footer: Built with Next.js, React Flow, and OpenAI.
home.footerPowered: Powered by AI skill map generation.

suggestions.title: Career Suggestions
suggestions.subtitle: Based on your preferences, here are some careers you might enjoy:

career.generatingSubtext: This may take a few seconds
career.saveDescription: Sign in to save your skill map progress and access it from anywhere. Without signing in, your progress will be lost when you leave this page.
career.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this skill map? This action cannot be undone.

dashboard.signInDescription: Please sign in to access your dashboard and track your skill progress.
dashboard.startDescription: Explore career paths and start tracking your skill progress. Your saved paths will appear here.
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this skill map? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.bioPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself and your professional background...
dashboard.noExperience: No work experience added yet. Add your experience to include it in your resume.
dashboard.experienceRequired: Company, title, and start date are required
dashboard.noProjects: No projects added yet. Showcase your work to include it in your resume.
dashboard.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the project and your contributions...
dashboard.noEducation: No education added yet. Add your studies to include them in your resume.
dashboard.educationDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your coursework, achievements, or notable activities...

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to track your skill progress
auth.termsNotice: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

masterMap.title: Your Skill Universe
masterMap.subtitle: All your skills from every career path, intelligently merged
masterMap.emptyDescription: Start exploring career paths to build your personal skill universe. Each career you explore adds new skills to your collection.
masterMap.errorDescription: Something went wrong while loading your skill universe. Please try refreshing the page.
masterMap.helpText: Click on a career to view its full skill map. Scroll to zoom, drag to pan.

seo.title: Personal Skill Map - AI-Powered Career Skill Maps
seo.description: Discover and visualize your career path with AI-generated skill maps. Explore the skills you need to master your dream career.
seo.keywords: career skills, skill map, career path, AI learning, personal development, career growth, skill tree
seo.dashboardDescription: Track your skill progress and manage your career paths. View your personalized skill maps and learning journey.
seo.careerDescription: Explore the complete skill map for {career}. Discover the skills you need to master and track your progress.
seo.pricingDescription: Choose your plan and unlock unlimited skill maps, AI-powered features, and professional resume exports. Start free or upgrade for more.

skillGraph.sortTooltip: Re-arrange nodes in a neat layout

aiChat.title: AI Assistant
aiChat.welcomeMessage: Hi! I can help you customize your skill map. Try asking me to add skills, suggest what to learn next, or merge with another map.
aiChat.inputPlaceholder: Ask me to modify your skill map...
aiChat.readOnlyPlaceholder: Sign in to chat and modify this map
aiChat.errorMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
aiChat.previewDescription: The following changes will be applied to your skill map:
aiChat.mergeDescription: Combine two skill maps into one unified map
aiChat.selectMapToMerge: Select a map to merge with your current map:
aiChat.noOtherMaps: You don't have any other skill maps to merge with.
aiChat.errorLoadingMaps: Failed to load your maps. Please try again.
aiChat.errorMerging: Failed to merge maps. Please try again.
aiChat.mergeWarning: This will replace your current map with the merged version. You can undo this change.
aiChat.signInToApply: Sign in to apply these changes to your skill map.

import.title: Import Skills
import.subtitle: Extract skills, contact info, education, experience, and projects from your resume or portfolio
import.urlExamples: LinkedIn, GitHub, personal website, or any URL

resume.modalSubtitle: Create a professional PDF resume based on your skills. Optionally target a specific job for better results.
resume.jobUrlHelp: Paste a job posting URL to tailor your resume to specific requirements
resume.generateFailed: Failed to generate resume. Please try again.

learning.title: Learn {skill}
learning.subtitle: Resources to help you master this skill
learning.fetchFailed: Failed to load resources. Please try again.
learning.noResults: No resources found. Try searching on Google for tutorials.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start free and scale as you grow. All plans include AI-powered skill mapping.
pricing.creditsSubtitle: Purchase credit packs for additional AI operations

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Credits are used for AI operations like generating skill maps, analyzing careers, importing documents, and creating resumes. Each operation costs a certain number of credits.
faq.a2: No, purchased credits never expire. Monthly subscription credits reset each billing cycle.
faq.a3: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

pricing.signInRequired: Please sign in to manage your subscription
pricing.planUpdated: Your plan has been updated successfully!
